title: Coronavirus: Spain 'close to passing peak' as deaths fall again
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain 'close to passing peak' as deaths fall again - BBC News
maintext: However, views on wearing masks appear to be shifting in Western countries, with US health authorities on Friday recommending their use in public. Austria, the Czech Republic, Israel and Turkey have also mandated the use of masks in various public places.
